snippet: Center fielder Angel Pagan, a former Met, and left fielder Melky Cabrera, an ex-Yankee, are being counted on to help the Giants return to their championship form.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that center fielder Angel Pagan, a former New York Met, and left fielder Melky Cabrera, an ex-New York Yankee, are being counted on to help the San Francisco Giants return to their championship form.
lead_paragraph: Center fielder Angel Pagan, a former Met, and left fielder Melky Cabrera, an ex-Yankee, are being counted on to help the Giants return to their championship form.

headline.seo: San Francisco Giants Counting on Pagan and Cabrera
headline.main: New York Castoffs, Bay Area Catalysts
headline.print_headline: New York Castoffs, Bay Area Catalysts
